name: Beacon Hill Two Bedroom
neighborhood_overview:
Beacon Hill is famous for museums and historical sites/trails.
The neighborhood is rich in history and one can sense it when they walk up and down the brick roads.
description:
Easy Self check-in Beacon Hill 2 bedroom with new appliances, fireplace, rustic details, in a classic brick brownstone. Excellent value because of the location to many Boston attractions including TD Garden, Freedom Trail, and Boston Commons. Also primed for short terms employees or guests of MGH, Government Center, State Street and more.

The apartment is up two flights of stairs.

The space
1x Full Sized Bed
1x Full Sized Futon
1x Twin XL
White Bleached Duvet Cover, Fitted Sheet, Pillow Cases
Charmin Ultra Soft for extra comfort.

Guest access
The apartment is furnished. The apartment is up two flights of stairs. Washer/dryer in common area of the building. Commercial laundry facilities are located in the neighborhood.

Other things to note
Parking is difficult, but not impossible. There are meters within a few block radius around the apartment. Those same meters allow overnight parking. E
